Text: What happened to episode 7? Taken down like building 7?

Yea, ep7 !
Maybe there's something there that Oliver Stone doesn't WANT us to see.
silly people that episode was never uploaded anywhere for some reason. My guess is that people didn't realized the show was still airing over the Christmas holiday
There has got to be some way to find a source for episode 7.

According to http://www.sho.com/sho/oliver-stones-untold-history-of-the-united-states/season/1/episode/7#/index , any Showtime subscriber with either "On Demand" or "Showtime Anytime" service -- and the ability to capture from the service -- has until 05-Feb-2013 to get episode 7.
